SEARCH
Package Backend.Entity

Class InternshipOpportunity

java.lang.Object
Backend.Entity.InternshipOpportunity
public class InternshipOpportunity extends Object
Represents an internship opportunity in the system. An internship opportunity is created by a company representative and must be approved by career center staff before students can view and apply to it. Company representatives can create up to 5 internship opportunities. Each opportunity can have a maximum of 10 slots.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipOpportunity

      public InternshipOpportunity(String internshipID, String internshipTitle, String description, String internshipLevel, List<String> preferredMajors, Date openingDate, Date closeDate, String status, String companyName, String companyRepInChargeID, int numOfSlots, List<Integer> applicationNumberList, List<Integer> acceptedApplicationNumbers, boolean visibility)
      Constructs a complete InternshipOpportunity with all fields.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - Unique identifier for the internship
      internshipTitle - Title of the internship position
      description - Detailed description of the internship
      internshipLevel - Level of the internship (e.g., "Undergraduate", "Graduate")
      preferredMajors - List of preferred student majors
      openingDate - Date when applications open
      closeDate - Date when applications close
      status - Status of the internship (pending, approved, rejected)
      companyName - Name of the company offering the internship
      companyRepInChargeID - ID of the company representative managing this internship
      numOfSlots - Maximum number of students that can be accepted
      applicationNumberList - List of pending application numbers
      acceptedApplicationNumbers - List of accepted application numbers
      visibility - Whether this opportunity is visible to students

      closeDate - Date when applications close
      companyName - Name of the company offering the internship
      companyRepInChargeID - ID of the company representative managing this internship
      numOfSlots - Maximum number of students that can be accepted

      public void approveApplicationNumber(int applicationNumber)
      Approves an application by removing it from the pending list. Note: Does not add to accepted list yet - that happens when student accepts the offer.
      Parameters:
      applicationNumber - The application number to approve

    • studentAcceptedOffer

      public void studentAcceptedOffer(int applicationNumber)
      Adds an application to the accepted list when student accepts the offer. This implements the deferred acceptance workflow.
      Parameters:
      applicationNumber - The application number to mark as accepted
